title: Anyone had any issues with bluetooth connection causing music to skip?
content: Sound skips when i'm using my QC35ii's walking to work, but doesn't skip when i'm sat at my desk all day? I've also got some bose sound sports and they've never skipped when I've been out running. Anyone else had a similar issue? - Edit i use spotify for all my music.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
